name: openstreetmap-date-format
description: Format openstreetmap dates (like start_date) in a localized string
author: Stephan BÃ¶sch-Plepelits <skunk@xover.mud.at>

scripts.build-test: npm run build-locale && browserify --debug test/en.js -o dist/test-en.js && browserify --debug test/de.js -o dist/test-de.js
scripts.build-locale: for i in `ls locale/` ; do browserify locale/$i -o dist/locale-$i ; done
